short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-redirects from Instagram homepage to the following tab. Freedom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension auto-redirects you from the Instagram home feed filled with suggested posts from accounts you don't follow to the following tab. Hopefully this allows you to have more control over the content you consume.
